comment.author: 25725739@N00
comment._content: Good Day....This photograph was PROBABLY taken CIRCA 1871...The explanation is complicated.....The same photo is at the Library of Congress [www.loc.gov/pictures/item/brh2003004960/PP/]....download that image in the maximum MEGABYTE size, TIFF format......use an image viewer, I use and like IRFANVIEW to expand [blow up for you old time photo enlargers] the image..... as you get "deeper" into the photo, you will see a sign on the building just to the RIGHT of FORD's Theater.....you will be able to read the words....This business was part of the CENTRAL DISPENSARY established in 1871 to administer to the city's indigent.... The image has long been mislabed as haven been taken DURING the Civil War....Dave
